snippet: Investors focused on healthy financial results, and looked past global hot spots, sending the markets higher and erasing most of the prior day’s losses.
abstract: Investors jump on wave of strong corporate financial results, sending stocks higher for third time in five days.
lead_paragraph: Investors focused on healthy financial results, and looked past global hot spots, sending the markets higher and erasing most of the prior day’s losses.

headline.main: Strong Corporate Earnings Trump Geopolitical Worries
headline.print_headline: Strong Corporate Earnings Trump Geopolitical Worries
